title: shrI rAdhA
sahitya:
shrI rAdhA.  rAgA: behAg.  tALA: rUpaka  shrI rAdhA ramaNA jaya pankaja caraNA kSIrAbdi shayanA sArasa daLa nayanA


caraNam 1    jaya nanda kumArA taDi navanIta cOrA jaya jagadAdharA shrta jana mandArA
  caraNam 2    jaya jaya gOpAlA kuvalaya daLa nIlA jaya durjana kAlA jaya sajjana pAlA
